Social Impact

Social Impact Consulting Social Enterprises Ecosystem Builders

Andela

Location: San Francisco, CA

https://andela.com/

Mission to solve the global technology talent shortage by building high performing engineering teams with Africa’s most talented software developers. This is Mark Zuckerberg’s first big tech investment in Africa. It has a mission to help grow the tech ecosystem across the African ecosystem.

Aspiration

Location: San Francisco, CA

https://www.aspiration.com/

An online financial firm with a conscience that is founded on the principles of trust and committed to giving 10% of earnings to notable charities. They provide banking services with $0 ATM and monthly fee and invests client’s deposits to socially-responsible investing options. This provides a way for individuals to do good while saving money.

Khan Academy

Location: San Jose, CA

https://www.khanacademy.org/

A nonprofit social enterprise with a goal to help education people through the creation of online tools and videos. Khan Academy has a mission to provide free, world-class education for anyone and anywhere. It empowers students to learn in their own pace in and out of the classroom.
